posts.post_content:
Just got one yesterday. It is a fantasic card.  
  
I can't decide whether to add it to my deck though. I like the card too much to shuffle it.  
  
UPDATE: I added it. It saw play in two games and won them both for me. I'd actually say this card is the oposite of [Mycoloth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycoloth). Mycoloth devours things and produces a lot of tokens. This produces tokens that devour stuff.

posts.post_content: This card is just amazingly kick\*\*\*. Between the various dragon buff cards out there, this shouldn't be a problem. Combo it with any number of Jund cards that give a bonus when you sac a creature, and you're golden. Crucible of Fire? Even if it's not devouring anything, you've got a 4/4 flier. Doubling Season? Pop out two, devour one, and it becomes a 5/5. Lots of options here, and at the end of it, you've just got at on of fliers going around. Great card, great card.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
I got this card and [Lord of Extinction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lord of Extinction) in a single booster lol...missed Lord of Extinction the first time I went through the booster because it was kinda stuck to the card above it. Not a bad pull from a booster at all, I must say.  
  
But yeah, this card is pretty amazing as long as it doesn't get killed right away by spells. Won me two 1v1 games last night (one of them where I was down 20 life to 4).

Posted By: RJTheDestroyer (8/2/2009 2:14:51 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Run three of them in my Devour deck. The token production is nuts in a large multiplayer game, since you get one at each player's upkeep. At the end of 5 players turns you can get 9/9 flier *without* [Doubling Season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Season).  
Also a great combo with cards like [Kresh the Bloodbraided](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kresh the Bloodbraided) or [Rockslide Elemental](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rockslide Elemental)  
My only real gripe is the lack of Black in the mana cost, making it vulnerable to cheap removal. (Maybe take out one of those three Red?)  
4.5/5
posts.html:

Also a great combo with cards like Kresh the Bloodbraided or Rockslide Elemental
My only real gripe is the lack of Black in the mana cost, making it vulnerable to cheap removal. (Maybe take out one of those three Red?)
4.5/5
